name: Stena AB
goal: Shipping företag med färjor, tankbåtar och oljeriggar, With care, innovation and efficient performance as their guiding principles, our 15,000 employees around the world work every day to create value for our customers within our business areas Ferry Operations, Offshore Drilling, Shipping, Property, Finance and New Business.
interests: Climate Action, Customs, Energy, Environment, Taxation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: White paper on transport, shiprecycling, port reception, greenhouse gas, VAT revision, energy tax directive, passenger ship safety
